The Related Discourses

11. Powers

The Powers group consists of 60 sutras when abbreviated sutra variants are counted. The material is found in fascicle 26 of Taisho No. 99. Below is a list of the English translations currently available.

Note: Previous English translations currently available at SuttaCentral are referenced below. The reader should be aware that titles for SA sutras are supplied by the translator(s).
